fields.label: Add Custom Awards
fields.name: add_custom_awards
fields.instructions: Check box to add page specific awards. Otherwise if left unchecked, global awards can be edited in the Awards tab from the Admin Dashboard.

choices.child-full: Child header block (with featured image & intro block)

fields.label: Banner Form / Contact Link
fields.name: banner_cta_form_contact
fields.instructions: Add link to contact page. Text will not appear if this field is left blank.

fields.label: Banner Foreground Image
fields.name: banner_foreground_image
fields.instructions: If no foreground image is selected, only a background image will appear.

fields.label: Button Text
fields.name: contact_button_text
fields.instructions: If left blank, no button will display.

sub_fields.label: Thumbnail Url
sub_fields.name: thumbnail_url
sub_fields.instructions:
Youtube thumbnails can be accessed through this url:
https://img.youtube.com/vi/insert-youtube-video-id-here/0.jpg

Or use a custom thumbnail uploaded to your media library

choices.left: 2 column - map left, copy block right
choices.right: 2 column - copy block left, map right

fields.label: Directions Link
fields.name: map_directions_link
fields.instructions: If left blank, this will not appear in the content block.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Exclude the list number, this will be generated automatically.

fields.label: Notice!
fields.message: This element will automatically generate a testimonial. Navigate to Reviews in the sidebar to add or edit existing testimonials.

fields.label: Card Columns
fields.name: card_columns
fields.instructions: Select the number of columns to display your link cards with

fields.label: Center Copy
fields.name: enable_full_link_card_style
fields.instructions: Check this box to display bold title at the top and copy in the center. If left uncheked, copy will appear next to the arrow button link.

fields.label: Add Title Card
fields.name: add_title_card
fields.instructions: Enable to add an unlinked title card to the beginning of the list of cards

fields.label: Review Source Image
fields.name: review_source_image
fields.instructions: Select an image based on the review source (Ex. Google, Avvo, etc)

fields.label: Override Global Stats
fields.name: override_global_stats
fields.instructions: check this box to override the global sites that are set under the Site Customizations tab.

fields.label: Button Text
fields.name: button_text
fields.instructions: This field is optional. If left blank, no button will appear.

fields.label: Video Embed URL
fields.name: video_embed_url
fields.instructions: Copy just the URL from the video Iframe

choices.bio: Include bio snippet (if selected, excerpt will be pulled from body copy)
